medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports persistent heartburn symptoms that worsened than usual last night, prompting him to go to the hospital. He has a history of hyperglycemia with multiple visits for similar symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type I Diabetes Mellitus - poorly controlled, seizure disorder (secondary to hypoglycemia or alcohol withdrawal), past surgical history includes inguinal hernia repair and appendectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of lung cancer, mother died at unspecified age.
